items.sentence: Tom told me he thought this book was interesting.
Tom was the one who told me you ought to do that.
Tom was shivering, and his teeth were chattering.
Tom heard a noise and stopped to see what it was.
Doing that was harder than I thought it would be.
One of the servants told Tom Mary wasn't at home.
When we checked this morning, the cage was empty.
Tom didn't drop out of school, but he almost did.
I can't believe Tom actually spent money on this.
Tom made it very clear that we shouldn't do this.
